actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.

actions.subcommittee: National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation, and Public Lands

official_title: To require the conveyance of certain Bureau of Land Management lands in Nye County, Nevada, to Ponderosa Dairy in Amargosa, Nevada.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey to Ponderosa Dairy, Amargosa, Nevada, all right, title, and interest of the United States in and to a certain parcel of real property in Nye County, Nevada, that is administered by the Bureau of Land Management in exchange for payment in an amount equal to the fair market value of the property.

titles.title: To require the conveyance of certain Bureau of Land Management lands in Nye County, Nevada, to Ponderosa Dairy in Amargosa, Nevada.
